name: YesorNo
0:
”Alexa, start yes or no”
”Alexa, open yes or no”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: yes or no
des: During our life we take too many decisions day after day and some of them steal too much time from us. With this skill everything will be easier, if you have a question that can be answered with a yes or a no, well, you can leave it up to the skill! Should I go to my friend's party tonight? Should I say confess my love to my crush tomorrow? Just say "Alexa, start yes or no" and let yoursefl be guided by fate. Maybe the universe is reserving some special surprise for you!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
